rows.label: qst702101_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, everyone, you've
come at a good time...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0002
rows.name: I am one of Adel-sama's retainers...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0003
rows.name:
And I'm currently serving
as the medic for the large
resistance army in Aletta.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0004
rows.name:
We are short on staff... and
also short on supplies.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0005
rows.name:
We are especially lacking a
medicinal herb called Panacellin.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0006
rows.name:
Panacellin can be gathered
at the Tirkin Cliff Colony,
where the Tirkins live.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0007
rows.name:
I once sent some men from the
resistance to collect it, but...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0008
rows.name:
Invidians are so reckless
and hot-blooded.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0009
rows.name:
They fight at the cost of their
own bodies, so no amount of
medical supplies is ever enough.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0010
rows.name:
The Panacellin they brought back
was used up in an instant.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0011
rows.name:
Therefore... I would like to
ask for your cooperation.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0101
rows.name: Please collect some Panacellin for me.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0102
rows.name:
It can be found at the Tirkin Cliff
Colony, where the Tirkins live.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0201
rows.name: Did you perhaps bring some Panacellin?

rows.label: qst702101_msg0202
rows.name:
And you're all unharmed,
in perfect health.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0204
rows.name:
I really wish the members of
the resistance would learn
from your way of fighting.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0205
rows.name:
Well, I suppose there aren't
many as skilled as you...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0206
rows.name:
In any case, thank you. This
will last us for a while.
